item.title: Pricing
item.description: Personal $19 / lifetime For personal use. Purchase Now For one developer For one product Can't be used in a product for sale GitHub support only Lifetime free updates Team $78 / lifetime For small teams. Purchase Now For upto 8 developers For upto 5 products Can be used in a product for sale GitHub and email support Lifetime free updates Organization $185 / lifetime For large teams and organizations Purchase Now For unlimited developers For unlimitted products Can be used in a product for sale GitHub, Email and Skype support Lifetime free updates Lock in your rate before price increase: $25, $99, $240 respectively from Jan 7th, 2022.
